comment_why: Studies with less sites or small sample size
We try and offer something on phase 1, phase ii, phase iii and complex designs but its not always possible
Risk management to all studies but cetralized monitoring not for small sample size studies or single site studies or with short duration studies - process under implementation
Rbqm concept driven by early/late clinical operations
Its been difficult to establish meaningful qtls
All studies considered to take risk based approach as risk assessments and mitigation planning are done for all.
